member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModuleSessionCallbacks.KeyMessage
member.summary: Called when the Content Decryption Module (CDM) has generated a message for the session.
member.param: A value from the enumeration specifying the type of the message.
A pointer to a BYTE array containing the message contents. Messages are Key System-specific.
The size of the array in the message parameter.
A optional parameter containing the destination URL.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModuleSessionCallbacks.KeyStatusChanged
member.summary: Called when there has been a change in the keys in the Content Decryption Module (CDM) session or their status.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModuleSessionCallbacks
member.summary: Provides a callback mechanism for receiving key status change updates from an .
